description: A stylesheet that defines CSS variables for theme management, styles for the application layout, including light and dark themes, and responsive behavior for the application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styles with responsive design and transitions for background and text colors.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, including flexbox layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for link elements within the application with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
